sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Fumer a beaucoup de mauvais effets.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking has many disadvantages.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette rivière est très large.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This river is very wide.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè nándé de jīhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une occasion rare.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a rare opportunity.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La santé est la chose la plus importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Health is the most important thing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le liǎng jiàn yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté deux vêtements.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought two pieces of clothing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce fruit s'appelle durian.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This fruit is called durian.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais te chercher à l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'll pick you up at the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime me faire des amis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to make friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中秋节是中国的传统节日。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngqiūjié shì Zhōngguó de chuántǒng jiérì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Fête de la Mi-Automne est une fête traditionnelle chinoise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Mid-Autumn Festival is a traditional Chinese holiday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Míngtiān jiāng jǔxíng yī chǎng bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un match aura lieu demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A competition will be held tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pourrait pleuvoir demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It might rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīngcháng qù nà jiā kāfēi diàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais souvent dans ce café.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I often go to that coffee shop.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais bientôt obtenir mon diplôme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm about to graduate.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你对这件事有什么看法？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì yǒu shénme kànfǎ?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est ton opinion sur cette affaire ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What's your opinion on this matter?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhī xiǎo gǒu zhēn kě'ài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce petit chien est vraiment mignon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This puppy is really cute.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Joyeux anniversaire !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Happy birthday!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le train arrive bientôt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The train is about to arrive.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est toujours en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is always late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào lí wǒ jiā hěn jìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'école est très proche de chez moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The school is very close to my home.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天我见到了一位老朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān wǒ jiàndào le yī wèi lǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui j'ai rencontré un vieil ami.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today I met an old friend.
